Package it.polimi.ingsw.Updates

Interface Update

All Superinterfaces:
Convertible
All Known Implementing Classes:
BuyDevUpdate, CheckUpdate, ConnectionErrorUpdate, DiscardLeaderUpdate, EndgameUpdate, EndTurnUpdate, ErrorUpdate, ExistingPlayerUpdate, LastTurnUpdate, LobbyUpdate, LorenzoUpdate, MarketUpdate, MoveUpdate, NewGameUpdate, PlayLeaderUpdate, ProduceUpdate, SPEndgameUpdate, StartGameUpdate
public interface Update
extends Convertible
The interface implemented by every update.

An update is an object created by the Game and sent by the Players, server side, to the PlayerDatas, client side. The Update contains the information about of what happened on the server; once it is received by the players, it modifies their status according to the information in itself. Some updates bring with them even a message to show.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleUpdate​(PlayerData data)
    Called by all the PlayerData on the client, so that it can modifies themself according to wha was modified on the server.

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.Convertible

    getClassName

  • Method Details

    • handleUpdate

      void handleUpdate​(PlayerData data)
      Called by all the PlayerData on the client, so that it can modifies themself according to wha was modified on the server.

      The Update is handled in two different ways by the players based on whether the update is relative to an action the player did himself or if the update involves an other player.

      Parameters:
      data - the playerData on which the update operates
